column2:
"Thanks, <%me>, you were
a huge help. Here's your reward."

"Let's work together again when you have some
more spare time. Like I said before, we make a
good team. You're easy to work with."

"We were lucky the terrain was on our side this
time, but our teamwork? That's got nothing to
do with luck!"
"Well, I hope to see you again soon."
